title: Can someone help me locate the name of a book, it was about three teenage girls who solve mysteries, and they have a teacher who was once an extra on Doctor Who and a grandmother who is obsessed with crime novels and custard creams? - Quora

response.answer_text: While I can’t help you directly, I can point you to the New York Public Library, which has a blog where you can ask questions (assuming you don’t get an answer here.) Finding a Book When You've Forgotten Its Title Use the link above to get to that site. Hope that helps.
